module.name: product_as_individual_assembly_and_test
module.name.french: Produit en tant qu'assemblage individuel et essai

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of an assembly of physically realized objects and representation of the results of testing physically realized objects, including the activity that leads to the results.

inscope.li: results of testing physically realized objects including the activity that leads to the results;
items within the scope of application module Activity, ISO/TS 10303-1047;
items within the scope of application module Process plan, ISO/TS 10303-1803;
items within the scope of application module Product as individual, ISO/TS 10303-1164;
items within the scope of application module Property assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1030.
